googleSearch.description: Performs a Google search using gemini-cli and returns structured results.

params.limit: Maximum number of results to return (optional).
params.raw: Return raw search results with URLs and snippets (optional).
params.yolo: Automatically accept all actions (aka YOLO mode).
params.model: The Gemini model to use. Recommended: "gemini-2.5-pro" (default) or "gemini-2.5-flash". Both models are confirmed to work with Google login.

chat.description: Engages in a chat conversation with gemini-cli.

params.prompt: The prompt for the chat conversation.
params.yolo: Automatically accept all actions (aka YOLO mode).
params.model: The Gemini model to use. Recommended: "gemini-2.5-pro" (default) or "gemini-2.5-flash". Both models are confirmed to work with Google login.

analyzeFile.description: Analyzes files using gemini-cli. Supported file types: Images (.png, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .webp, .svg, .bmp), Text (.txt, .md, .text), Documents (.pdf)

params.filePath: The absolute path to the file to analyze. Supported: .png, .jpg, .jpeg, .gif, .webp, .svg, .bmp, .pdf, .txt, .md, .text
params.prompt: Additional instructions for analyzing the file. If not provided, Gemini will provide a general analysis.
params.yolo: Automatically accept all actions (aka YOLO mode).
params.model: The Gemini model to use. Recommended: "gemini-2.5-pro" (default) or "gemini-2.5-flash". Both models are confirmed to work with Google login.

executeTask.description: Executes a coding task using Gemini as a sub-agent. Gemini can edit files, generate code, run commands, and perform other development tasks.

params.task: Description of the task to execute. Be specific about what you want Gemini to do.
params.workingDirectory: Working directory for the task. If not provided, uses current directory.
params.yolo: Automatically accept all actions (aka YOLO mode). Defaults to true for task execution.
params.model: The Gemini model to use. Recommended: "gemini-2.5-pro" (default) or "gemini-2.5-flash". Both models are confirmed to work with Google login.
